body.p: The recognition of the lease liability and the related component of the lease asset’s cost may give rise to equal taxable and deductible temporary differences as explained in paragraph BC79. The amendments apply to any such equal taxable and deductible temporary differences that arise. In addition, making advance lease payments or paying initial direct costs could result in additional taxable temporary differences associated with the lease asset, to which an entity would apply the applicable requirements in IAS 12. In response to requests to do so, the Board included an example illustrating the accounting for deferred tax on advance lease payments and initial direct costs.
